Property.Name: PurReqnDoOnlyValidation
Property.sap:quickinfo: Boolean Variable (X = True, - = False, Space = Unknown)

Property.sap:quickinfo: Control indicator for purchasing document type

Property.sap:label: GR processing time
Property.sap:quickinfo: Goods receipt processing time in days

Property.Name: SupplyingPlant

Property.sap:quickinfo: Supplying (issuing) plant in case of stock transport order

Property.Name: OrderedQuantity
Property.sap:label: Quantity ordered
Property.sap:quickinfo: Quantity ordered against this purchase requisition

Property.Name: ExternalApprovalStatus
Property.sap:label: Ext Apprvl Status
Property.sap:quickinfo: External Approval Status in the Preceeding Document

Property.Name: CreatedByUser
Property.sap:label: Created By
Property.sap:quickinfo: Name of Person Who Created Object

Property.Name: ManualDeliveryAddressID
Property.sap:quickinfo: Manual address number in purchasing document item

Property.sap:quickinfo: Distribution Indicator for Multiple Account Assignment

Property.Name: PurchaseContractItem

Property.sap:quickinfo: Item number of principal purchase agreement

Property.Name: PurReqnSSPCatalog

Property.sap:quickinfo: Technical Key of a Web Service (for Example - a Catalog)

Property.Name: ReleaseStrategy
Property.sap:label: Release strategy
Property.sap:quickinfo: Release strategy in the purchase requisition

Property.Name: PerformancePeriodStartDate
Property.sap:label: Start Date
Property.sap:quickinfo: Start Date for Period of Performance

Property.sap:quickinfo: End Date for Period of Performance

Property.Name: ItemNetAmount
Property.sap:label: Tot. val. rel.
Property.sap:quickinfo: Total value at time of release

Property.Name: AddressID
Property.sap:quickinfo: Manual address number in purchasing document item

Property.Name: LastChangeDateTime

Property.sap:quickinfo: UTC Time Stamp in Long Form (YYYYMMDDhhmmssmmmuuun)

Property.sap:quickinfo: Region for PO Box (Country, State, Province, ...)

Property.Name: FullName

Property.Name: StreetSearch
Property.sap:quickinfo: Street Name in Uppercase for Search Help

Property.Name: CitySearch
Property.sap:quickinfo: City name in Uppercase for Search Help

Property.Name: TransportZone
